text: Zudas, ana Zisas ndim ana pana gumgi farve khɨngi guma, ana Zisas garim, mbe ana nzuav nzuav, guigira ana mbevigim, ana vergim, mbe simtɨgar ana ndɨɨi. Ana mba tɨva gangia thav wom ndap dorgav mba Fhe Bakɨme rotu gari gumgir pani gu mben gumgir ruu ana nɨɨŋgi 30 thɨgi sirva fɨgiveiŋ, ana taagia nta ndiga mbe ndi vugi.
